item.title: Hugo & Firebase work well together
item.description: So I’ve been playing around a little bit with Hugo and Firebase - that’s what this new site is built with. It is also the first time I’ve played around with text/markdown to build a website. Not a bad combination to build a static page based structure and you can see that I have gone to town on with a simple hugo theme inspired by the geniuses behind bettermotherfuckingwebsite.com. It wasn’t super hard to get it all together.
